message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with unsweetened almond milk, chia seeds, flaxseeds, and fruit (e.g. berries or banana)
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, avocado, and a vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter

Day 2:
Breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, kale, banana, pineapple, and coconut water
Lunch: Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and mustard on a brown rice tortilla
Dinner: Lentil soup with mixed vegetables (carrots, celery, peas) and a side of whole-grain bread
Snack: Celery sticks with hummus

Day 3:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, mushrooms, and roasted red peppers
Lunch: Quinoa salad with black beans, corn, bell pepper, lime juice, salt, and pepper
Dinner: Grilled vegetable skewers (zucchini, yellow squash, bell peppers) served over brown rice
Snack: Carrot sticks with sunflower seed butter

Day 4:
Breakfast: Greek-style yogurt (lactose-free or plant-based alternative) topped with raspberries, chia seeds, and a drizzle of agave nectar
Lunch: Tuna salad with mixed greens, avocado, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Baked sweet potatoes with roasted chickpeas and steamed green beans
Snack: Orange slices with sunflower seed butter

Day 5:
Breakfast: Chia pudding made with almond milk, topped with sliced strawberries and a light drizzle of agave nectar
Lunch: Quinoa-stuffed bell peppers with ground turkey, black beans, corn, tomato sauce, and spices
Dinner: Grilled shrimp with a side of sautéed spinach and wild rice
Snack: Sliced cucumber with sunflower seed butter

Day 6:
Breakfast: Oatmeal made with almond milk, topped with sliced banana, chopped walnuts, and cinnamon
Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and a lemon-tahini dressing
Dinner: Turkey meatballs with marinara sauce and whole-grain pasta
Snack: Sliced pear with sunflower seed butter

Day 7:
Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole-grain bread, topped with cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of paprika
Lunch: Roasted vegetable wrap (e.g. eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper) with tahini sauce
Dinner: Baked tempeh with a side of roasted cauliflower and quinoa
Snack: Sliced apple with sunflower seed butter
